item.title: Presentations
item.description: Tips for this assessment method Make sure that the rules and requirements for making a video recording are clear, and don’t forget the audio. Use a live recording if it is necessary to intervene in the activity or discuss it immediately afterwards, or if the activity needs to be done properly in one go or within a certain time. Otherwise, it is easier to make a video recording.
